title: No irregularity found in Bihar polls: Govt says citing EC
description: The government informed the Lok Sabha that no irregularities were found in Bihar's assembly elections, as per the Election Commission. Mandatory VVPAT slip verification showed no discrepancies with EVM counts. While shredded VVPAT slips from a mock poll were …
content: No irregularities were found in the conduct of assembly elections in Bihar, the government told Lok Sabha on Friday citing the Election Commission.In a written reply, Law Minister Arjun Ram Meghwal s… [+1150 chars]
